casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Bobby Ray McCOLLUM. No. 355P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 3, 2007. Alexander McC. Peters, Special Deputy Attorney General, Robert F. Johnson, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th day of August 2006 by Attorney General to Deem Response to Petition for Discretionary Review Timely Filed:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of May 2007."
